fields.name: Spring Thunder of Fertility (C1)
fields.value: The number of Abundance Amulets that can be generated using Lightning Blade is increased to 3.

fields.name: Violet Vehemence (C2)
fields.value: When Falling Thunder created by Bellowing Thunder hits an opponent, it will decrease their Electro RES by 15% for 8s.

fields.name: Distant Crackling (C3)
fields.value: Increases the Level of Bellowing Thunder by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Fickle Cloudstrike (C4)
fields.value: When a character obtains Abundance Amulets generated by Lightning Blade, if this character's Energy is less than 35%, the Energy restored by the Abundance Amulets is increased by 100%.

fields.name: Clamor in the Wilds (C5)
fields.value: Increases the Level of Lightning Blade by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: World-Shaker (C6)
fields.value: Every 2 Falling Thunder attacks triggered by Bellowing Thunder will increase the DMG dealt by the next Falling Thunder by 200%, and will restore an additional 1 Energy to the current character.
